notes: All-electric adventure pickup truck built in Normal, Illinois. 135-180 kWh battery packs (varies by year/trim). 400V/800V architecture. Quad-motor and dual-motor configurations. Requires EV-certified technicians for high-voltage systems. Data sourced from Wikipedia Rivian R1T article, January 2025 revision.

All-electric three-row SUV built in Normal, Illinois. 135-180 kWh battery packs (varies by year/trim). 400V/800V architecture. Quad-motor and dual-motor configurations. Requires EV-certified technicians for high-voltage systems. Data sourced from Wikipedia Rivian R1S article, January 2025 revision.
